summary: This is an email chain from November 2020 arranging an FBI visit to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) for Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorney to review the contents of a laptop. It involves coordination between an Assistant United States Attorney and FBI agents.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate at MDC who, along with her attorney, is scheduled to review the contents of a laptop during an FBI visit.

persons.name: Charkani
persons.context: Copied on the email chain as an FBI agent involved in the coordination for the MDC visit.

connections.description: FBI agent Charkani is involved in coordinating a visit to Maxwell at MDC for evidence review.

events.title: MDC Laptop Review Visit
events.description: An FBI visit is arranged for Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorney to review the contents of a laptop at the Metropolitan Detention Center.

keyFacts: In November 2020, Ghislaine Maxwell was an inmate at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
An FBI visit was arranged for Maxwell and her attorney to review the contents of a laptop, indicating ongoing evidence examination in her case.
The coordination involved an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and multiple FBI agents.
